Description:
Amid the debris of what appears to be an ancient building, a faint spark catches your eye. It seems the magical aura protecting a book has successfully preserved this particular volume and its nearby treasures from the erosion of time.

Unfortunately, the same magical aura prevents you from touching the book.

Only when you notice that the crest you discovered in Senenthia is glowing with a similar light do you understand: the answer to the crest's mystery lies within that book.
DescriptionAction: At last, we can solve the mystery!

    "SSRewardHealthFlat": 0,
    "SSRewardHealthPercent": 0.0,
    "SSRewardText": "When you place them together, the energy from the book is absorbed by the emblem, deactivating the shield protecting the book and allowing you to read it.\r\n\nThe book details the emblems of noble houses that fought in the Archon Wars. This crest belongs to House Ader.\r\n\nHouse Ader was a beloved house that achieved several key victories in the war against the Archons. Through their leadership, those who fought alongside them were able to overcome any adversity.\r\n\nUnfortunately, the house was exterminated in a battle where they chose to fight the enemy to buy time for their allies to escape. Those saved that day, thanks to House Ader’s sacrifice, incorporated part of Ader’s crest into their own to honor the act.\r\n\nThe most prominent house to adopt this tradition was House Casthak. Over time, however, its meaning was forgotten.\r\n\nBefore leaving, you gather some resources that were also protected by the book’s shield. \r\n",

    "SSRewardHealthPercent": 0.0,
    "SSRewardText": "(Amelia): “This book is fascinating. It talks about the different noble houses that fought in the Archon War, and here is the symbol we’ve been searching for.\r\n\nIt belongs to House Ader, a beloved house that achieved several key victories during the war against the Archons. Through their leadership, those who fought alongside them were able to overcome even the greatest adversities.\r\n\nTragically, the house was wiped out in a battle where they chose to stand against the enemy, buying time for their allies to escape. Those saved that day, thanks to House Ader’s sacrifice, incorporated part of Ader’s crest into their own as a way to honor their heroic act.\r\n\nThe most prominent house to adopt this tradition was House Casthak. Over time, however, the crest’s meaning was forgotten.\r\n\nThis is a profound revelation. I will share this knowledge with House Casthak once my daughter is rescued. Let’s gather the treasure before leaving.”",

    "SSRewardText": "(Andrin): “This book is about the different noble houses that fought in the Archon War, but hey, here is the symbol we’ve been searching for.\r\n\nIt belongs to House Ader, a beloved house that achieved several key victories during the war against the Archons. Through their leadership, those who fought alongside them were able to overcome even the greatest adversities.\r\n\nTragically, the house was wiped out in a battle where they chose to stand against the enemy, buying time for their allies to escape. Those saved that day, thanks to House Ader’s sacrifice, incorporated part of Ader’s crest into their own as a way to honor their heroic act.\r\n\nThe most prominent house to adopt this tradition was House Casthak. My house! I can’t believe that we forget the crest’s meaning.\r\n\nThis is a profound revelation. I will share this knowledge with my brother once our mission is completed. Let’s gather the treasure before leaving.”",

    "SSRewardText": "(Reginald): “This book is about the different noble houses that fought in the Archon War. Interesting... Here is the symbol we’ve been searching for.\r\n\nIt belongs to House Ader, a beloved house that achieved several key victories during the war against the Archons. Through their leadership, those who fought alongside them were able to overcome even the greatest adversities.\r\n\nTragically, the house was wiped out in a battle where they chose to stand against the enemy, buying time for their allies to escape. Those saved that day, thanks to House Ader’s sacrifice, incorporated part of Ader’s crest into their own as a way to honor their heroic act.\r\n\nThe most prominent house to adopt this tradition was House Casthak. The house I will be head of someday... I can’t believe that we forget the crest’s meaning.\r\n\nThis is a profound revelation. I will share this knowledge with my brother once our mission is completed. Let’s gather the treasure before leaving.”",

    "SSRewardText": "(Wilbur): “This book is fascinating. It talks about the different noble houses that fought in the Archon War, and here is the symbol we’ve been searching for.\r\n\nIt belongs to House Ader, a beloved house that achieved several key victories during the war against the Archons. Through their leadership, those who fought alongside them were able to overcome even the greatest adversities.\r\n\nTragically, the house was wiped out in a battle where they chose to stand against the enemy, buying time for their allies to escape. Those saved that day, thanks to House Ader’s sacrifice, incorporated part of Ader’s crest into their own as a way to honor their heroic act.\r\n\nThe most prominent house to adopt this tradition was House Casthak. Over time, however, the crest’s meaning was forgotten.\r\n\nThis is a profound revelation. I will study this book later and share this knowledge with House Casthak once the mission is completed. Let’s gather the treasure before leaving.”",
